mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.musician_id AS "yybMusician.id", a.name AS "name", a.img AS "img", a.remarks AS "remarks",
b.name AS "yybMusician.name"
LEFT JOIN yyb_musician b ON b.id = a.musician_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yyb_musician_album( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, musician_id, name, img, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{yybMusician.id}, #{name}, #{img}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yyb_musician_album SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, musician_id = #{yybMusician.id}, name = #{name}, img = #{img}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
